entries.title: Community-led Humanitarian Response
entries.metaDescription: Legatum wants to see a humanitarian response system that supports crisis-affected people’s own initiatives to help each other survive with dignity, strengthen communal wellbeing, and start addressing root causes of vulnerability.

entries.title: Ebola Crisis Fund
entries.metaDescription: In 2014, Legatum joined forces with Geneva Global to launch the Ebola Crisis Fund. It raised almost US $1 million and impacted over 5.7 million lives

entries.title: Haiti Earthquake Recovery
entries.metaDescription: Legatum's Haiti Earthquake Recovery Fund was launched in 2010 in response to this devastating natural disaster
